csc:body.p: To protect ourselves from spam, we use reCAPTCHA to shield our E-mail addresses from bots. Please note that this page was hacked up quickly and isn't very user-friendly. It will hopefully get better in the future when we can find time to improve it.
General inquiries can be addressed to Brandon McCaig himself. Click here and follow the instructions to retrieve the appropriate E-mail address.

If you have questions or concerns for the administrators of the Web server or Web site then you can address them specifically. They'll go to the same person as general inquiries, but this allows them to stand out better in the mailbox. ^_^. Click here and follow the instructions to retrieve the appropriate E-mail address.
